subtitleNullable: Daraz Top Sales Watches, Bags & Accessories for Kids, Women & Men Dataset 2024
descriptionNullable:
**Name:** Daraz Top Sales Products Dataset 2024
**Data Age:** Data is Collected on 02, February 2024. - The dataset contains information about the top selling products in ***Daraz*** Marketplace (Daraz.com) since (January 2024), which is one of Pakistan’s leading e-commerce platforms. - It includes details such as product name, category of the product, price and number of sales for each product since the month of January 2024. - It contains 1087 entries with 11 columns. **Some Potential Use Cases:**
*Product Recommendation Systems:* Build recommendation models to suggest relevant products to users based on their preferences, purchase history, and browsing behavior. *Market Basket Analysis:* Analyze user purchase patterns to identify associations between different products. This information can be used for bundling or optimizing product placements. *Customer Segmentation:* Segment customers based on their shopping behavior, preferences, and demographics. This segmentation can be valuable for targeted marketing strategies. *Price Prediction:* Develop models to predict the optimal pricing for products based on various factors such as demand, competition, and historical pricing data. *Trend Analysis:* Analyze trends in product preferences over time to identify popular styles, colors, or brands. This information can be valuable for inventory management and marketing. **Disclaimer:**
- The data presented here has been acquired from "Daraz" Marketplace (Daraz.com) which is one of Pakistan’s leading e-commerce platforms. - I would like to emphasize that this data is intended for educational and informational purposes only. - The purpose of using this data is to gain insights, conduct research, and analyze patterns.
